answerText: Ensign Beverly [accept either underlined portion][10] Name this playwright who wrote about the Teazle and Surface families in The School for Scandal and also created Jack Absolute in The Rivals.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 01 | 15 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character is first introduced as the employer of Fag, but Fag quickly reveals that he and Captain Absolute are one and the same. [10] Name the guise Jack Absolute takes on in order to court Lydia Languish. This character is challenged to a duel by Acres before Acres realizes it is Jack.
